skills.name: King of Hearts
skills.description: Immediately launches a grenade, dealing 350% Physical Damage to all enemies hit and stunning them for 3 seconds

skills.name: Jack in the Box
skills.description: The next attack buries a mine (lasts for 120 seconds) in a deployable tile within this unit's attack range; The mine will detonate when an enemy passes by it, dealing 280% Physical Damage to all nearby enemies and stunning them for 2 seconds

skills.name: D12
skills.description: Places bombs on up to 4 enemies within range, prioritizing enemies with the highest HP; after a delay, bombs will detonate, each dealing 310% Physical Damage to nearby enemies and stunning them for 5 seconds

talents.name: Ambush
talents.description: After remaining deployed for 10 seconds, obtains 60% Physical and Arts Dodge, and is less likely to be targeted by enemies

talents.name: Insult to Injury
talents.description: Enemies in range take +21% <@ba.talpu>(+3%)</> physical damage when stunned
